channel.title: I got the concept down
channel.description:
Well, alright. As you guys might have noticed, I've been having problems with my barrage damage. Well, I found out, the one thing code I was posting, was the damage it gives to the NPC's. Well, I was wondering, where can I find where it gives damage to the [b]players[/b], while pking?
Would it be in client.java? Because I could not find it. Or would it be in a different file, thanks for the help in advance.

item.title: I got the concept down
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

This should work…

if (magicID == 12891 && !NonWild()) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell), only in the Wildy { if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); setAnimation(1979); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 7; addSkillXP((170 * playerLevel[6]), 6); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); //sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //Uhh not really? stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

item.title: I got the concept down
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Alright guys, look. This is my whole Ice Barrage code. It seems that this only applies for NPC’s though. I can’t find the one for players.

:l

The NPC’s is fixed, the max I can hit on an NPC is 35, and that’s how I want it for players also.

Here is the code from my Ice Barrage.

[code=java]}

                    if (magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
                    {
                        if (playerLevel[6] >= 94) {
                            if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false)
                                    || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)
                                            == false)
                                            || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)
                                                    == false)) {
                                sendMessage(
                                        "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
                            } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true)
                                    && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2) == true)
                                    && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6) == true)) {
                                hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30);
                                setAnimation(1979);
                                // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer();
                                // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle();
                                // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
                                inCombat();
                                PkingDelay = 7;
                                addSkillXP((170 * playerLevel[6]), 6);
                                // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
                                // sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
                                stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
                                deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
                                deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2);
                                deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);
                                teleportToX = absX;
                                teleportToY = absY;
                                // server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
                            }
                        } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
                            sendMessage(
                                    "You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
                        }[/code]

Read full topic
